it.hackcaffebabe.netutil.mail

Class SimpleMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Message
      • javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage
        • it.hackcaffebabe.netutil.mail.SimpleMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.mail.internet.MimePart, javax.mail.Part

    public class SimpleMessage
extends javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage

    Simple class that represents the message that will be send as email.
    Use the follow example to create a simple email.
    After that use MailerManager class to send it: 

     SimpleMessage m = new SimpleMessage( openedSession );
 m.setSender( new Email( "sender.email@domain.asd" ) );
 m.setRecipient( new Email( "recipient.email@domain.asd" ) );
 m.setBodyMessage( "Hello this is a text", Arrays.asList( new File( "myfile.txt" )) );
    Remember to use null attachment list to send email without attachments.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea Ghizzoni. More info at andrea.ghz@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • parseEmails

        public static java.util.ArrayList<NetUser> parseEmails(java.lang.String emails)
                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method returns a list of NetUser from a string given.
        That string must be in format ; ; ecc..
        NB: If there is only one email, the format must be ;
        Parameters:
        emails - String formatted like ; ; ; ...
        Returns:
        ArrayList of NetUser
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input string is not in format or null;

        Parameters:

      • setBodyMessage

        public void setBodyMessage(java.lang.String text,
                  java.util.List<java.io.File> attachments)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           javax.mail.MessagingException
        Sets the body of email.
        Parameters:
        text - String the text body of email.
        attachments - List list file as attachments. Set this arguments at null, or empty list to doesn't set attachment on emil.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if text given is null.
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if there are problem with adding recipient email.
